name: Fly Plane: Flight Simulator 3D
description:
Fly 40 different routes with your choice of more than 15 airliners to earn stars, beat the clock and explore lush, detailed locations.

-40 exciting levels!
-15+ branded aircraft!
-Gorgeous graphics and locations!
-Free play mode to explore and practice!
-Awesome explosions!
-User-adjustable layouts and settings!

Easy to pick up and difficult to master; great fun for all ages!
